regen.absent_element: system automatic reversion to default settings post-manual changes
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically revert to its default settings after the termination of the user's manually adjusted period.

regen.absent_element: specification of time period management and state transition to default
regen.new_specification: The system shall be able to define, manage, and transition power states according to the defined time periods, resuming default states upon period completion.

regen.absent_element: resuming default settings after manual switch duration ends
regen.new_specification: At the end of the user-defined switch state period, the system shall resume the default settings for the appliance.

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
